Text:
4gb..too big, for a movie once watched, gonna be deleted.

Will appreciate if under 1gb in the future..thanks.

Pointless for such a biz size..if it aint effects-heavy flick.

Mr. Kent, you seemed to be very dissatisfied with every torrent I upload. You can GTFO no one is forcing you to download. I only upload HI-RES. I don't care if your Internet speed sucks and you r too poor to afford a hard disc.
